grid.title: Grid
grid.description: Layout grid components for organizing content with different patterns

components.title: GridBasic Example 1
components.description: - Example
components.code:
<GridBasic
data={[
{
title: "Interactive Web App",
subtitle: "Modern React application with seamless user experience",

color: "#6366f1",

height: 600,
description: "Interactive web application"
}
},
{

components.title: Case Study Post Tile
components.description: - Case Study Post Tile
components.code:
<PostTileCs
post={{
title: "Project Title",
subtitle: "A brief description of the project",
slug: "project-slug",
client: "Client Name",
date: "January 2023",
tags: ["Web Design", "Development"],
img: {
url: "https://example.com/image.jpg",
width: 800,
height: 600,
description: "Project cover image"
}
}}
aspect="4:3"
/>
/
